mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MZ_REVIEW ORDER BY MZREVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT MZ_REVIEW.*, "SHOP".SHOP_NAME FROM MZ_REVIEW JOIN SHOP ON MZ_REVIEW.SHOP_NO = SHOP.SHOP_NO WHERE MZREVIEW_NO = #{mReviewNo} ORDER BY MZREVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT MZREVIEW_TITLE, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, MZREVIEW_FILENAME FROM MZ_REVIEW WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC) AS NUM, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE FROM MZ_REVIEW) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC) AS NUM, MZREVIEW_TITLE, MZREVIEW_NO, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, SHOP_NAME, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE FROM MZ_REVIEW M JOIN SHOP S USING(SHOP_NO) WHERE M.USER_NO=#{userNo} ORDER BY MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MZ_REVIEW VALUES(SEQ_MZ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{mReviewTitle}, #{mReviewContent}, #{mReviewWriter}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{userType}, #{userNo}, #{shopNo}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE MZ_REVIEW SET MZREVIEW_TITLE = #{mReviewTitle}, MZREVIEW_CONTENT = #{mReviewContent} WHERE MZREVIEW_NO = #{mReviewNo}
UPDATE MZ_REVIEW SET MZREVIEW_HIT = MZREVIEW_HIT + 1 WHERE MZREVIEW_NO = #{mReviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT MZREVIEW_TITLE, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, MZREVIEW_FILENAME FROM MZ_REVIEW WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo})
